item.title: Canvas Koala, Radial UI
item.description: Custom radial UI made in Godot for my WIP project Canvas Koala.

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Jacob (feel free to call me Jakey), a UI/UX Designer with over seven years of full-time experience creating intuitive experiences for web, mobile apps, and games!

Self-motivated and always learning, I welcome new challenges. In my spare time, I work on creative projects – some of which I have shared down below.

I’m excited to transition my UI/UX skills to the games industry, designing engaging experiences and growing in game-specific UI/UX.

item.title: Sumaburu
item.description:
itch.io/sumaburu

Local Multiplayer Sumo Fighting Action!

Solo project made from a love of local multiplayer and weird control schemes.

Two sumo fighters duke it out in the ring! Punch left, punch right, push each other out of the ring to emerge victorious.

Play against a computer or a friend with local multiplayer on the same keyboard and multi-controller support. I recommend Switch Joycons using BetterJoy.

item.title: Go Go Big Mode
item.description:
itch.io/gogobigmode

Retro Sci-Fi Arcade Shooter

Solo-built third-person arcade shooter for Game Jam — retro sci-fi theme with custom icons for upgrade paths, crafted rapidly under tight deadline.

You are Go Go, a small galaxy bot. The solar system is being invaded by BBB (Big Bad Bots)!!!

Go Go Big Mode and save the galaxy!

item.title: Kalimari
item.description:
itch.io/kalamari

Solo Godot Mobile and Browser Game

Solo project in Godot to learn the engine and publishing to Google Play. Now web version on itch.io after Android API updates hid the original package.
